lead_paragraph: Prosecutors on Monday asked a court to convict the captain of the Costa Concordia cruise ship and sentence him to 26 years in prison for the 2012 shipwreck off Tuscany that killed 32 people.
snippet: Prosecutors on Monday asked a court to convict the captain of the Costa Concordia cruise ship and sentence him to 26 years in prison for the 2012 shipwreck off Tuscany that killed 32 people.

headline.main: Italy: Prosecutors Seek Long Sentence for Cruise Ship Captain
headline.print_headline: Italy: Prosecutors Seek Long Sentence for Cruise Ship Captain
